message_1: Suppose you want to encrypt the message "MATHEMATICS" using the Vigenere cipher with the keyword "CRYPTO". What is the resulting encrypted message?
message_2:
To encrypt the message "MATHEMATICS" using the Vigenere cipher with the keyword "CRYPTO", we first need to repeat the keyword to match the length of the message:

MATHEMATICS
CRYPTOCRYPT

Now, we use the Vigenere cipher table to find the corresponding encrypted letter for each pair of letters in the message and the keyword. The table can be found here: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vigen%C3%A8re_cipher#/media/File:Vigen%C3%A8re_square_shading.svg

M (message) + C (keyword) = O (encrypted)
A + R = R
T + Y = G
H + P = V
E + T = B
M + O = W
A + C = C
T + R = W
I + Y = Q
C + P = Q
S + T = W

So, the encrypted message is "ORGVBCWCWQW".
